body:
# ![RedPanda Logo](http://thehhd.com/files/redpanda.png)  Welcome to Team Red Panda 
Team Red Panda is a 4 member development team who's aim is to create apps for their CMPT 385 class. The focus of the apps is to create educative games that utilize word lists provided by the CANIL Linguistics Institute. These word lists are designed to promote the literacy at an accelerated rate.

## Table of Contents
* Members of Team Red Panda
* Assignments
* [Meeting Minutes and Agendas](https://github.com/Hobbit/CMPT385/tree/master/Meetings)
* Support

## Members of Team Red Panda
* ###Peter Grypma (@petergrypma)
    * **Role:** Project Leader
    * **Email:** Peter.Grypma@mytwu.ca
    * **Programming Profile:**
    * **Skills and Interests:** 

* ###**Chris Hobbs** (@Hobbit)
    * **Role:** Lead Developer
    * **Email:** Christopher.Hobbs@mytwu.ca
    * **Programming Profile:** C, C++, Objective-C, Java, PHP, HTML, MySQL, XML, Python, Pascal
    * **Skills and Interests:** Networking, Web and Database Development.

* ###**Hizkia Mertadiwangsa** (@hizkiam)
    * **Role:** Documentation
    * **Email:** Hizkia.Mertadiwangsa@mytwu.ca
    * **Programming Profile:**
    * **Skills and Interests:**

* ###**David Woo** (@davidwoo)
    * **Role:** Graphics and Notes
    * **Email:** ChiaHsin.Wu@mytwu.ca
    * **Programming Profile:**
    * **Skills and Interests:**


## Assignments
You can find the pages for the __various__ **assignments** here:
* [Assignment 1](https://github.com/Hobbit/CMPT385/wiki/Assignment-1) - Project Plan and Website
* [Assignment 2](https://github.com/Hobbit/CMPT385/wiki/Assignment-2) - Requirements and Initial Design
* [Assignment 3](https://github.com/Hobbit/CMPT385/wiki/Assignment-3) - Version 1
* [Assignment 4](https://github.com/Hobbit/CMPT385/wiki/Assignment-4) - Version 2
* [Assignment 5](https://github.com/Hobbit/CMPT385/wiki/Assignment-5) - Version 3

## Support
Having trouble with any of our products? First check out the online [documentation](https://github.com/Hobbit/CMPT385/wiki/Documentation). If that does not solve the problem please submit a new [issue report](https://github.com/Hobbit/CMPT385/issues) and resolve the problems as soon as possible.
